Documentation - About

The Admin Base Template

This template was designed Thank you for purchasing Admin Base template. This template was designed and coded from the bottom up to be flexible, usable to allow you to quickly put together great looking admin interfaces. A range of CSS elements are provided and are modular for easy use. This documentation will guide you through using the template and has detailed instructions and examples for all the major elements.

Support

I'd be glad to help you if you have any questions relating to this theme. Feel free to email me via my profile. You can also follow me on twitter for updates. If you have a more general question relating to the template on ThemeForest, you might consider visiting the forums and asking your question in the "Item Discussion" section.


Note: It is recommend the user has some knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript. If you are unfamiliar or have some problems in regards to the coding please refer to www.w3schools.com as it is an excellent resource for brushing up your skills and as a general reference.
